articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: According to Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson, the demise of FTX is a bellwether for a move "from companies and people to protocols."
articles.title: Cardano’s Hoskinson: FTX Collapse Proves ‘Absolute Need’ for Decentralization

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: After landing regulatory approval in a host of European nations, Binance is now reentering the Japanese market via a new acquisition.
articles.title: Binance Acquires Japanese Crypto Exchange Sakura

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: In crypto's race to the moon, seeking legal advice is often an afterthought, says blockchain attorney Lisa Rubin. That could backfire.
articles.title: Why Web3 Builders Should Get Legal Help Before Launching

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Despite its headcount crunch, Kraken founder Jesse Powell remains “extremely bullish on crypto.”
articles.title: Kraken Lays Off 30% of Staff as Bitcoin Bear Market Persists

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The company will begin offering Ethereum compatibility for its self-custodial wallets and security services in January.
articles.title: Bitcoin Security Firm Casa Embraces Ethereum

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Uniswap is also airdropping $5 million to some early Genie adopters.
articles.title: Uniswap Calls Its New NFT Aggregator a ‘Google Search’ for Trading

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bitcoin appears to be neither suitable as a payment system nor as a form of investment, according to the European Central Bank.
articles.title: Bitcoin Price Stability 'Last Gasp Before The Road to Irrelevance': ECB

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: LedgerX, which operated as a subsidiary of FTX.US, is reportedly preparing $175 million to be used in FTX's bankruptcy proceedings.
articles.title: LedgerX Preparing $175M Transfer to Bankrupt FTX: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: After the community backlash, Jack Dorsey's project TBD backed out of the previously announced plan to trademark the term “Web5.”
articles.title: Jack Dorsey's Bitcoin Project TBD Cancels Plan to Trademark 'Web5'

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Brazil’s congress has passed a bill that paves the way for banks to begin offering payment services around Bitcoin and other crypto assets.
articles.title: Brazil's Congress Moves to Regulate Crypto Payments

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Bankman-Fried became the poster boy for "effective altruism" but only donated publicly to Democratic candidates.
articles.title: SBF Hid Republican Donations So Media Wouldn't 'Freak the Fuck Out'

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Wrapped Bitcoin—WBTC—lost its peg last week. Here's what that means, and why it matters.
articles.title: What’s Happening With Wrapped Bitcoin on Ethereum?

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The lending protocols have implemented new security measures to block attacks after an attempted short squeeze last week.
articles.title: DeFi Giants Aave, Compound Freeze Markets and Cap Loans to Mitigate Risks

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The NFT marketplace head points to the benefits of decentralization and talks about creator royalties in the Solana NFT market.
articles.title: OpenSea CEO: FTX Fallout Is ‘Opportunity’ to Refocus on Trust

articles.description: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.
articles.title: Fintech Lawyer Says Crypto Companies Should Seek Legal Advice Before Launch

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Buterin doesn’t want traders to speculate on or hoard crypto governance tokens.
articles.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Calls Governance Token Speculation ‘Pathological’

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: "The Luna collapse really was the start of everything," lead attorney Joshua Sussberg said during the company's first day hearing.
articles.title: FTX, Alameda Owe BlockFi More Than $1 Billion: Court Hearing

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The bankrupt FTX cofounder also admitted in an interview published today that he prioritized Bahamian withdrawals.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Says FTX Hacker May Be a Former Employee

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: America’s biggest crypto exchange has scrapped a number of assets from its self-custody mobile app citing waning customer interest.
articles.title: Coinbase Wallet Delists XRP, Bitcoin Cash and Ethereum Classic

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Ethereum-based token is surging following the release of final staking details and the official ApeCoin NFT marketplace rollout.
articles.title: ApeCoin Up 31% as Staking Nears, Bored Ape NFT Prices Rebound

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: With the FTX contagion still at work, investors are now asking what's in store for Bitcoin as the crypto bear market deepens.
articles.title: Could Bitcoin Crash to $10,000? Market Experts Weigh In

articles.description: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt to discuss the history of Phantom and what he’s looking forward to in Web3
articles.title: Phantom Co-founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The popular wallet for the Solana blockchain is expanding to include two rival proof-of-stake blockchains.
articles.title: Phantom Solana Wallet Adds Support for Ethereum and Polygon

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: Lummis said that her bipartisan crypto bill could serve as a "framework" for looking at how the collapse of FTX could have been prevented.
articles.title: 'Bitcoin Senator' Lummis: FTX Collapse Shows 'It's Time' for Congress to Learn About Crypto

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The startup seeks to expand Web3 adoption via easy-to-play games that reward winners with NFT collectibles.
articles.title: Play Casual Games, Win NFTs: Burn Ghost Raises $3.1M for Gaming Platform

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Funding for crypto developer teams in Mysten Labs and Aptos Labs have lead DeFi and Web 3 deal-making in Q3 this year.
articles.title: Crypto Remains Largest Investment Sector in 2022, Outpacing Fintech And Biotech

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: SBF allegedly promised his stake in Robinhood as collateral to help the now-bankrupt crypto lender BlockFi through its liquidity issues.
articles.title: Bankrupt BlockFi Suing FTX Founder Over Robinhood Shares Promised as Collateral: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Dogecoin, the world’s most popular meme coin, is still beating the odds in the largely sideways cryptocurrency market.
articles.title: Dogecoin Jumps 8% Overnight, Continuing Two-Week Rally

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The company will pay employees and vendors, but not former CEO Sam Bankman-Fried or Caroline Ellison.
articles.title: FTX Resumes Post-Bankruptcy Payments to Employees

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The company, valued at $1.5 billion, is backed by Fanatics and was co-founded by Gary Vaynerchuk and Mike Novogratz.
articles.title: Gary Vee-Backed NFT Startup Candy Digital Cuts Staff in Mass Layoffs

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: A new CoinShares report suggests that investors continue to feel bearish following the FTX crash.
articles.title: Biggest Outflows in 12 Weeks as Investors Cash Out Following FTX Fall

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: U.S. regulators continue their crusade against the lack of sanction compliance among crypto exchanges.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange Kraken Settles With Treasury Department Over Iran Sanctions Violations

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Longtime media executive Keith Grossman is departing to join the crypto payments startup to help more companies enter Web3.
articles.title: Executive Who Brought Time Magazine Into Web3 Is Leaving for MoonPay

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Markets appear to have been rattled by COVID protests in China. BlockFi’s bankruptcy announcement hasn’t helped either.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Slide Lower With Stocks Amid China Unrest, Crypto Contagion Fears

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The largest creditors include the trustee company that manages its BlockFi Interest Accounts, FTX US, and the SEC.
articles.title: BlockFi Owes $1 Billion to Just Three of Its Largest Creditors: Bankruptcy Filing

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Elynxir music metaverse game from Deadmau5 and Richie Hawtin comes to life in Miami this week through augmented reality.
articles.title: Deadmau5’s Pixelynx Unveils NFT Scavenger Hunt: ‘Rock Band Meets Pokémon Go’

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly,Daniel Roberts
articles.description: BlockFi is the latest crypto firm to file for bankruptcy following the collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried's crypto empire.
articles.title: Crypto Lender BlockFi Filing for Bankruptcy and Conducting Major Layoffs as FTX Contagion Claims Another: Source

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: The Japanese social media firm Line will shutter its American crypto exchange, adding that the decision was unrelated to FTX’s collapse.
articles.title: Line to Shutter US Crypto Exchange Next Year, Suspends Onboarding Today

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The meme coin’s latest bull run may be related to the speculation that it could be involved in Elon Musk’s plans for Twitter.
articles.title: Dogecoin Jumps 22% in a Week Amid Twitter Payments Speculation

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Retail Bitcoin holders have been aggressively accumulating the leading cryptocurrency since the implosion of the FTX exchange.
articles.title: 'Shrimp' and 'Crab' Bitcoin Balances Hit Record Highs Amid FTX Collapse

articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: Everything ever invented came into existence in order to solve a problem. In the case of NFTs, they were created to address the limitations of their predecessors, which were created on the Bitcoin blockchain.
articles.title: Why NFTs Were Invented

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: Ryan Pinder's years in public service included a year-long break to work at Deltec Bank, a Bahamanian firm with ties to FTX.
articles.title: Attorney General of The Bahamas Defends Its Crypto Savvy in Wake of FTX Crash

articles.description: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.
articles.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.
articles.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.
articles.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'

articles.description: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next

articles.description: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
articles.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin

articles.description: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?

articles.description: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Reza Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.
articles.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.
articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
